name: MUSIC.INNOVATION.CONSUMERS COALITION "MIC"
description: A broad-based ad hoc coalition of organizations supporting transparency in music licensing
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to the ASCAP and BMI Consent Decrees review by the Department of Justice.
